start.speaker: Rill
start.text:
Give me a rule for crossings.

A rule you’ll follow when the water is dark, the stakes are high, and your excuses are ready.

choices.text: No crossing without a way back.
No crossing that makes innocents the price.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Rill nods, once. In Fenmire, that’s as close as anyone gets to a blessing.
